effect.black_white: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
effect.black_2_white_2: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped.

short_effect.black_white: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

flavor_text.black_white: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
